page_content:
Online Assistance

Version:MissionOS_2.0

If you encounter any problems with the system, you can reach 24/7 support via:

Email: mgs_support@maxwellgeosystems.com

Teams ID: MGS Support

Note:

Before seeking any assistance, it is recommended that you make an attempt to refresh the browser (using F5 or ctrl+F5). Also clear the cache through the browser options/setup.

 

To watch the Web User Manual video on Online Support and Assistance, simply click on the thumbnail or link below:

videos.title: How to: Access MissionOS Support and Assistance
